transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Namaskar madam. Hello
Customer: Ji Namaste sir. Hello
Executive: Haan ji madam ye haan hello
Customer: Haan ji sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapki. Hello
Executive: Haan ji madam kal Pal ji ne bola tha main Akshar molecules se bol raha hun ritual Akshar. Ji ji sir ji ji bataiyega sir aapko. Ne kal aapse ek request ki thi account holder ko change karne ke liye Shriya ji ko change karne ke liye. Ya usme kuch hua action plan.
Customer: Sir account holder change ki request ki thi but same time sir ne refund ki bhi request ki thi. To kyunki sir kuch close hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha refund mara to hamari baat ko. Haan sure.
Customer: Achcha ek minute dijiye sir main waha pe change kar deti hun just give me a moment. Mujhe laga aap ritual ke liye baat kar rahe hain just give me a moment. Madam dono hi account Shriya ke paas hai hamara Akshar ka bhi aur ritual ka bhi to humne to dono mein. Ji ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Kab tak bata denge madam?
Customer: Sir aap line pe hi rahe ye maine aapke account manager change kar diye Akshar molecules ke liye on immediate basis. Ye aapko reflect kar jayenge.

Executive: Hello. Haan ji madam. Hello. Haan ji haan ji sun. Sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko? Haan ji aa rahi hai madam. Aapke account manager Akshar molecules ke liye change ho chuke hain sir.
Executive: Theek hai unka contact number mil jayega madam?
Customer: Haan bilkul mil jayega sir aap line pe rahiye main bata deti hun aapko.

Customer: Sir may I know your good name please aapka naam jaan sakti hun?
Executive: Pradeep.
Customer: Pradeep ji okay.

Customer: Sir ye number likh lijiye aap jo aapke account manager rahenge unka.
Executive: Haan ji boliye.
Customer: 8102
Executive: 81
Customer: 02
Executive: 02
Customer: Haan ji 511
Executive: 511
Customer: 817
Executive: 817 Unka shubh naam kya hua ji?
Customer: Sir Rahul Sinha. Rahul Sinha aapko unka ek haan ji haan ji haan ji. Theek hai. Main aapko unka ek aur number agar aapko chahiye to main aapko ek aur number de deti hun jo recorded line ka rehta hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Sir ek 80488
Executive: 80
Customer: 488
Executive: 488 Ji.
Customer: 92
Executive: Ji.
Customer: 984
Executive: 984 Theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji sir ek cheez aur ye maine Akshar molecule ke liye changes kiye hain na baki maine ritual ke liye. Haan kya keh rahe hain. Account manager change kar diye Mr. Rahul Sinha. Ye ek minute Pal ji baat karenge madam please. Haan ji haan ji karwaiye.
Executive: Ji sir. Kaise hain madam? Hello ji sir. Kaise hain aap? Main kaha. Main bilkul badhiya hun sir aap bataiye aap kaise hain? Bas hum jab tak IndiaMART pe kaam kare tab tak to theek mushkil reh payenge. Paanch din se dekho IndiaMART se baat chal rahi hai viral bhi theek nahi ho raha 10 se baat chal rahi hai aapke sath dekho. Kitna coincidence. Nahi nahi sir I am extremely sorry agar IndiaMART ki wajah se aapki health suffer kar rahi hai to but intention aisa bilkul bhi nahi hai ki aapki health suffer kare hamari. Aaj bhi dekho jo product madam 13 product hate hue the aaj wo 25 ho gaye hain aur mujhe abhi tak 13 product ki bhi aapki report nahi aayi hai ki wo 13 mein bhi kaun se ban formulation hai jo se disco ke according hai aapne list thi abhi tak wo bhi nahi aayi hai hamare paas. Aapko wo sir agar wo wo wo product to main aapko aap bolenge main abhi share kar dungi actually main aapko bata deti hun last time mere senior ka call gaya tha Ziya ji ka to unhone jab unhe bataya tha ki ye kuch products hain ye due to this reason aapke rejected hain to sir ne sare hi aise products ke liye request kiya tha kyunki hamare yahan par aise bahut sare products hain sir to sari list dena to matlab it's next to impossible hai but out of 13 ya 25 products mein se kaun se products hain jo aapke us reason se rejected hain wo main aapko share kar sakti hun usme koi problem nahi hai. Hmm. Medical. Aur aapne jaisa request kiya tha. Product rejected hue hain. 25 Sorry sir. Hamare aapne pe time le hua hai ye. Sir kal tak jab aapki meri baat ho rahi thi. Haan ji. Sir mujhe. Kal tak kitne the madam aap jab aapki hamari baat ho rahi thi 13 na? Sir kal 13 the ji. Aaj 25 ho gaye hain. Sir unme modification raha hoga I am sure kyunki maine kal bhi jab baat. Haan main wohi to bata raha hun na madam dekhiye main main yahi to chah raha hun ki us 25 mein aapko hamari kis modification se problem hai ki agar hume aage wo modification kar di ya nahi kar di wo hum decide to kar le apni. To uske liye sir maine actually aap is wajah se hata rahe hain aur aapka hatane ka reason kuch aur ho matlab agar matlab aap samajhiye differences of diagnosis hai ya differences of perception hai to fir hum kabhi ek cheez ko to conclude kar hi nahi payenge na aap samajhiye. Bilkul agreed sir to uske do reason the major boliye aap boliye aap kuch keh rahe hain. Nahi nahi aap bataiye bataiye do reason kaun se main hai. Ek reason ye tha aapka ki kuch certain products the jo NDPS aur CDSCO ke jo drugs the uski wajah se reject hue the theek hai uska aapko list chahiye ki out of 25 wo kaun se products hain wo main aapko share kar sakti hun apni team se check karke theek hai other than that aapka agar koi bhi product mein sir to basically kya hota hai aapke kyunki waha pe personal mail id aur number hain jahan jahan system wo capture kar payega ki aapke wo number aur mail id mention hai waha waha wo use reject kar sakta hai kyunki sir wo ek software hai kahin wo check kar pa raha hai kahin nahi check kar pa raha hai par wo ek reason ye rahega aur iske liye hi maine sir ko bola tha ki aaj main aapko bolun ki nahi sir wo in future nahi hoga aap jab bhi modification ke liye sir koi bhi product dalte hain mere back end pe wo manually approve hone ke liye jata hai ki haan main ye product approve karna hai ya reject karna hai certain products mein ye drug ka issue hai isliye reject ho rahe hain kuch products mein wo email id ya number capture ho rahe hain isliye reject ho raha hai ye do major reason hai sir jiski wajah se ho raha hai haan ji. Theek hai aap ek kaam kariye email id aur wo contact number to main hata ke 10 15 product aur lagata hun usko hum dekhte hain aapka AI hatata hai ya nahi hatata hai iska to solution mere paas ye hai dusra jo 13 product jo aapka NDPL ya aap bata rahe hain se disco ki ban list se hua hai unki aap mujhe list dijiye ek bar. Bilkul sir bilkul wo main de deti hun aapko no problem. Solution pe kaam karte hain agar solution nikalta hai theek hai nahi nikalta hai to madam koi baat nahi. Kamota hume bata hi diya hai. Theek hai na ye list aap hume kab tak de dengi? Sir main abhi request dalungi to main koshish karungi aaj dene ki but by max main kal tak aapko provide kar dungi theek hai koshish karungi jaldi jaldi aapko revert kar. Account manager aapne hamari change kar di hai? Sir Akshar molecule ke liye change kar di hai ritual ke liye abhi Shriya hi hai. Ji. Fir hum ritual ka kya kaam abhi band rakhe kya kare usme kyunki usse to baat madam mere ko suit nahi karta karna bilkul bhi. Sir main agar aapko thoda sa na usko mujhe nahi pata ki kya usko matlab kis cheez ka proud hai I don't know ki kyun hai aur kya hai pehle to yahi nahi samajh aaya kya hai kis reason se hai theek hai na chaliye hota hoga corporate employees na koi wajah hoti hogi lekin mera usse man nahi karta baat karne ka ya to aap training dilaiye kisi customer se baat kaise karni hai. Sir dekhiye waise matlab wo baat karte karte wo baat karte karte Ankita ji ek dam na matlab frank hone lagti hain jaise main aur wo rishtedar hai aapas mein hamare Haryana mein aap kahan se aati hai Ankita ji? Sir main Mathura se belong karti hun Mathura Uttar Pradesh Mathura se UP se. Chaliye bahut bahut holy jagah hai jahan se aap aati hai matlab hamare yahan Haryana mein kehte hain kehte hain bura mat manna main ek aapko example de raha hun. Hmm hmm. Tu hamare Haryana mein kehte hain matlab jaise sali hoti hai na sali jija se baat karti hai. Haan bataiye. Hmm. Samajh rahe hain us type ki wo frank hone ki sochte hain ki hum aise baat karne lag jaye customer se maine ek misal di hai aapko samjhane ke liye kaise wo matlab sorry agar nahi main samajh rahi hun but I am extremely sorry agar aisa aapko laga ki kahin bhi kuch unprofessional aapko feel ho raha hai but agar aisa hai to just feedback has been taken main uska khayal rakhungi main unse baat karti hun agar aapko lagta hai ki waha nahi hai meri baat to aap sunte nahi hai matlab patiently aap pehle customer ki baat sun lijiye aapko ek cheez ke liye jahan aapki galti hai waha to aapko ye haan sir yaha pe to mere se miss ho gaya har hafte ka madam inko inke senior ne ek kaam de rakha tha ki aap inko weekly report dijiye har hafte ki bana kar bahut time tak ye deti rahi hai main inko bahut appreciate karta tha ki chalo bahut achchi ladki hai time pe kaam karti hai sara ye hai wo hai uske baad madam jab humne inko do char bar appreciate kar diya ye us cheez ki hawa le gaye hawa lena aap samajhte hain kya hota hai matlab us cheez ko matlab inko ye ho gaya ki ab koi jarurat hi nahi hai hum haan to be granted inhone le liya ab uske baad inhone ek whatsapp group hamara bana hua tha kyunki dekho kya hai Pradeep ji hamara IndiaMART ka kaam dekhte hain sales wagera sara kaam dekhte hain mere ko kai bar cheeze matlab updated version mein chahiye hoti thi to maine group bana rakha tha jisme Shriya bhi thi hum bhi sab log the to wo bhi inhone ye keh ke matlab group delete kara diya ki IndiaMART se order hai upar se jabki humne do teen logo se pata kara unhone bola aisa koi order nahi hai ki agar koi group bana rakha hai customer ke sath to aapko wo delete karna mandatory hai chaliye koi baat nahi maine kaha theek hai if you are not willing to be less within matlab be less in a group system to koi baat nahi hume to aapse weekly report chahiye madam almost teen week ho gaye hain ki inhone hume report hi nahi di kal bhi humne jab mere ko beech mein involve hona pada tab inhone mujhe wo report di matlab ek time tak ye kaam theek karte hain fir inko appreciate koi kar de to ye matlab wo a jate hain to be granted wale system pe jo meri request hai next manager ko bhi samjha dijiyega ki bhai aap customer se customer jitna hi relation rakhiye frank hone ki koshish mat kariye. Bilkul sir feedback noted sir aur main personally khayal rakhungi aapko aur kya mujhe ye list de do 13 products ki aur main ek bar 13 product ki list aane ke baad usko bhi padh leta hun aur apni taraf se ye mail id aur phone number hata kar ke bhi main kuch product lagata hun aur dekhte hain ek hafte tak kya wo hatate hain ya nahi hatate hain theek hai aisa koi system nahi hai man lijiye main ek product ka pura aapko ek detail bana ke mail kar dun aap usko check karke approve kar de ki ha ji ye sab theek hai ya isme bhi koi kami hai taki madam for the future matlab purpose hum koi record to rakh le cheez ka ab wo nahi hai banda kya naam tha uska wo jo kya naam hai uska kya hai bhai are nahi wo senior kaun tha iska ka agar wo nahi hai to hum dono to aapas mein jhagad rahe hain na ki ne bola tha ya nahi bola tha to is type ki cheeze aage to na ho madam. Sir iske liye sir dekhiye main agar aapko bolun ki aap mujhe koi list doge main as manually ya koi bhi ek person check kar paye main suniye list nahi hai madam ji main aapko ek product ka sab kuch jo 100% score karne ke liye uske alag alag parameters hain wo ek ya do product ka kisi ka bhi pura karke aapko ye dikha dunga ki hum har product mein ye ye cheeze laga rahe hain agar aap okay karegi to hum laga denge agar aap kahenge nahi isme bhi problem hai aap ye ye cheez change kariye hum change kar denge fir aapse approval lenge lekin jab tak koi cheez pe aap aur hum ek cheez ko finally diagnose karke conclude nahi karenge aur hum future ko bhi guarantee nahi kar sakte madam ki aage bhi AI is cheez ko chalne dega nahi chalne dega hume business kaise aayega madam aap khud bataiye main samajh gayi ki agar koi bhi cheez aisi hai jiski wajah se aapke products reject ho rahe hain kya hum use workout karke correct karke usko theek kar sakte hain thoda sa aap flexible hokar thoda sa hum flexible hokar aap yahi kehna chah rahe hain to us case mein ji to us case mein sir hume karna yahi padega ki hume pehle jo bhi aapke do ya teen products hain aap jaise hi wo update karwayenge aap hume de dijiye detail ya aap apni team se kara lijiye jaise hi hum wo update karenge wo 24 hours ka kuch time meri team leti hai waha par wo log back end mein check karenge agar wo reject hote hain main dobara se check karwa lungi ki kya exact reason hai aur jo aapke already rejected hain main usme jo drug license ki wajah se reject ho rahe hain main aapko wo list de deti hun hum mutually koshish karte hain chezo ko solve karne ki theek hai sir chaliye theek hai theek hai okay theek hai theek hai okay sir thanks a lot thank you thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to change account manager for ritual.

- Products are getting rejected.

- Wants a list of rejected products.

- Shriya is being too frank.

- Weekly reports not being sent.



Resolution:

- Account manager changed for Akshar molecules.

- Provided contact numbers of account manager.

- Agreed to provide a list of rejected products.

- Assured to take feedback about Shriya.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide the list of rejected products.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, rejected products, weekly reports, ndps, cdsco
